text:
2018 could be the most important year in science history. Few months ago a resercher has discovered a new molecule that will change our lives. This resercher and his work team created by synthesis a molecule with very interesting properties. They already test it on animals and during these tests they saw that animals wich received this molecule could live 2 or 3 times more longer than the other animals which received a placebo.
In fact this is the biggest science discovery since the penicillin in 1928. The product did not show any nefast effects. Furthermore clinical tests on human being will start in few days. Of course a human can live much more longer that a rat but scientist said that they could see if there is a delay in cellular death also in a couple of month they will be able to say if this new medication is really efficient and without any danger.
 In my opinion, play with human lives is very dangerous. First there will be inequalities between the poor and the rich. A medication that can increase by 2 your life will obviously cost a lot.
In one hand a magical pill like that it's amazing, who didn't thought one day about to be immortal ? But on the other hand it's a lot of problems. If everybody can live so longer there will be billions and billions of human in Earth, we will not be able to feed all these people for exemple. Also a lot of ethicals problems will appear.
We need to be very carefull with new technologies and new discoveries.
